types.html:
aller de l'avant

  1. (figuratively, informal) to move on, to move forward, to forge ahead; to make headway, to make progress
    Antonym: tourner en rond
    Ça ne sert à rien de ressasser le passé, il faut aller de l'avant. ― It's no use dwelling on the past, you have to move on.
trans: to move on, to move forward, to forge ahead
to make headway, to make progress

title: aller de l'avant
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /a.le d(ə) l‿a.vɑ̃/
